manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_store_join_templatestyle_template_notice` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `sid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '姓名', `tel` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '电话', `type` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '类型', `content` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '回复内容', `order` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `create_time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '回复时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_store_join_templatestyle_template_message` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `template_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `replyid` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '通知处理', `notice` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '审核处理', `zcreate_time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '回复时间', `order` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_store_join_templatestyle_setting` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `weid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `background_images` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '背景图片', `logo` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'LOGO图片', `button_color` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '拨号、公告、提交背景色', `nav_icon` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '导航图标', `nav_link` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '导航文字', `nav_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `tel_icon` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '拨号图标', `tel_link` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '拨号文字', `nav_size` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图标大小', `link_color` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '公告字体颜色', `link_color1` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '导航字体颜色', `tel_url` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '拨号链接', `copyright` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `context` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '公告', `title1` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题（中文）', `title2` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题（英文）', `top_title` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '顶部标题', `reply_color` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '回复字体颜色', `share_context` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分享描述', `share_title` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分享标题', `share_logo` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分享LOGO', `updatetime` int(10) NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_store_join_templatestyle_leaving` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'openid', `cardsid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '标题', `zname` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '姓名', `zphone` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '电话', `zmessage` text NOT NULL COMMENT '留言', `zcreate_time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '留言时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
